atariCore

Class GameBackground

  • java.lang.Object
    • atariCore.BaseObject
      • atariCore.GameBackground

  • public class GameBackground
extends BaseObject
    Sets background images in gameplay.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int count
      counter to update GIF frames.
      private java.awt.Image[] images
      background images array.
      private int length
      number of GIF frames.
      private int timer
      limits frame updates to a specific time.

      • Fields inherited from class atariCore.BaseObject

        image, imageHeight, imageWidth, velX, velY, x, y

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameBackground(float x, float y, java.awt.Image img)
      Parameterised constructor used to set a single image background.
      GameBackground(float x, float y, java.awt.Image[] images, int length)
      Parameterised constructor used to set a multiple image background.

    • Method Summary

      • GameBackground

                      float y,
                      java.awt.Image[] images,
                      int length)

        Parameters:
        x - image x-coordinate.
        y - image y-coordinate.
        images - images array (GIF frames).
        length - number of frames.
